summary: An new argonian shop outside Whiterun!
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Sells-Many-Things is not allowed to open a shop in Whiterun because he is an Argonian! But that won't stop him. He bought a patch of land and built his own shop from the ground up. The Argonian Trader is now open for business!
This is a small mod I made which adds a new shop to Skyrim. It's just outside of Whiterun, in front of the Honningbrew Meadery (see the map in the pictures). It has been hand-decorated to have an authentic feel, like any other shop in Skyrim. The merchant sells almost everything, including weapons, armor, scrolls, potions, ingredients etc... Please keep in mind I created this mod to test out my CK skills, and it's my first one.

Bugs/Issues:
Currently I do not know of any bugs in this mod, but if you come across any, be sure to let me know!

Compatibility:
This mod is only incompatible with any mods that alter the area around Honningbrew Meadery, which means it's probably compatible with most mods.
It's incompatible with Eli's Shack and Provincial courier service, but I made a patch for that.

Finally, I hope you enjoy this mod and if you have any issues with this at all contact me and I'll do my best to fix it.
author: Paulibobo

files.name: The Argonian Trader
files.changelogHtml:
Added barrels outside of the shop.
Fixed a navmesh issue outsie of the shop.
Added a lot of clutter and decoration in the shop.

files.name: The Argonian Trader
files.changelogHtml:
Added a background music.
Added backgroud noises.
Added more stuff for the merchant to sell.
Minor changes and fixes to navmesh and decoration.
If you commit any crime agains the merchant you will now get a bounty.
